entry.source: {F804,5}Proceed immediately to Shene Duque.{F804,0} This comes{F801}from a certain individual, but as Abbot of the{F801}Monastery, I have deemed it worthy of the highest{F801}attention and have thus contacted you. Be sure{F801}that you go to Shene Duque straightaway, without{F801}any detours.{F801}
